content:
Resort Overview

Escape the daily chaos with a retreat in the scenic Poconos Mountains. Split Rock Resort is conveniently located less than 5 miles from Interstate 80 at Exit 277 and the Pennsylvania Turnpike at Exit 95.

Our resort offers suites, lodge rooms, villas, and cottages with distinctive mountain town charm. Our historic Split Rock Lodge overlooks the beautiful Lake Harmony. Our Willowbrook and Galleria suites are modern and cozy. Our Villas at Westwood are perfect for long stays, featuring a fireplace, full kitchen, and dining area. Choose a Cottage as your home away from home for an intimate stay.
